equations.name: Binomial Expansion
equations.description: Where \({n \choose k}\), is the binomial coeffient, obtainable on a calculator through the \(\bold{c}\) button. In generalised form, this equation becomes, $$(a+b)^n=\sum^{n}_{k=0}\binom{n}{k}a^{n-k}b^k$$
